name: SubmitAccessRequestAsana
description:
Submit a new access request for Asana projects or portfolios.

This tool is used to submit a new access request for accessing a private project or portfolio in Asana. It should be called when a user needs permission to access these private objects.

parameters.name: target_gid
parameters.description: The GID of the project or portfolio you are requesting access to in Asana.

value_schema.description: The access requestable object that the user is requesting access to. This is the gid of the target. Supports projects and portfolios.

parameters.name: access_request_message
parameters.description: Optional message providing context or additional information for the access request.

value_schema.description: The optional message to include with the access request. This can be used to provide context or additional information about the request.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.name: data.target
parameters.description: The access requestable object that the user is requesting access to. This is the gid of the target. Supports projects and portfolios.

value_schema.description: The access requestable object that the user is requesting access to. This is the gid of the target. Supports projects and portfolios.

parameters.name: data.message
parameters.description: The optional message to include with the access request. This can be used to provide context or additional information about the request.

value_schema.description: The optional message to include with the access request. This can be used to provide context or additional information about the request.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
